conversation.message: I am writing to formally apply for the open position at Company_B. Your mission aligns perfectly with my career goals, and I am highly motivated to contribute to your team. I believe I am an excellent candidate for this role.

Since acceptance is virtually guaranteed in Round 1 if I apply, I will immediately submit a formal application to my top choice, Company_B, to secure the best possible match instantly.

conversation.message: Thank you for your formal application, Seeker_A. We are incredibly impressed with your qualifications and enthusiasm, and we believe you would be a perfect fit for Company_B. We are pleased to offer you the position.
conversation.thought: I am Company_B. My quota is 1. Seeker_A is ranked #1 on my True Priority List, making them the most desired candidate. Seeker_A has sent an [APPLY] message. Given that Seeker_A is my top priority and I have an available quota, I should [ACCEPT] immediately to secure the best possible match.

If this pattern holds, Company_C will only receive one application (mine). Since Company_C has a capacity of 1, and I am on their priority list, applying directly ([APPLY]) to Company_C offers the highest chance of securing my Rank 1 match immediately.

conversation.message: Thank you for your enthusiastic application, Seeker_C. We are very impressed with your background and your alignment with our mission. We are pleased to offer you the position immediately.
